briefTitle: Phase 3 Study of GSK548470 in Patients With Compensated Chronic Hepatitis B With Poor Response to Other Drugs
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Open-label Study of GSK548470 (Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate) in Patients With Compensated Chronic Hepatitis B With Poor Response to Other Drugs
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of once-daily treatment with GSK548470 300 mg in Japanese patients with compensated chronic hepatitis B with poor response to other drugs.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With HBV DNA Level < 2.1 log10 Copies/mL at Week 24
